SEARCH
Package cooking

Class Recipe

java.lang.Object
cooking.Recipe
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Recipe extends Object implements Serializable
Recipe class. Contains a name, people served. Also includes ingredients, utensils, and steps of a recipe.
Version:
10/24/24
Author:
f24team3d
